text:
@Mike_Pence @VP @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Covid-19 USA unofficial update 4/13
Cases 583,870 (+23,570 from yesterday) up 4%
Recovered 35,755 (+3769) 6.1% up .4
Deaths 23,485 (+1494) 4% up .1
Capricious virus disease
*patients with pre-existing conditions most at risk
*https://t.co/mGgXLPT9sn no updated data since 4/12
